original_text: And as the king of Israel was passing by upon the wall, there cried a woman unto him, saying, Help, my lord, O king.
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 성 위로 지나갈 때에 한 여인이 외쳐 이르되 나의 주 왕이여 도우소서

sentences.original_text: And as the king of Israel was passing by upon the wall
there cried a woman unto him
saying, Help, my lord, O king
